title: Out-of-State Corporations Aren’t Paying Their Fair Share (Clackamas County Democratic Party (Oregon))
text: ( Source : Clackamas County Democratic Party ( Oregon )) This is both a national and a global problem, but it hits Oregon harder than almost any other place: Oregon has the lowest corporate taxes in the country - by a lot. When corporations
